blogPost.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
blogPost.body: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
blogPost.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning
blogPost.author: Sungho Yahng

localize.description: 一款使用间隔重复、复杂的学习算法和树状结构的记事工具的网络应用。想想Workflowy和Anki的结合。它还汇集了各种学习理论和技巧。
一款使用間隔重複、複雜的學習算法和樹狀結構的記事工具的網絡應用。想想Workflowy和Anki的結合。它還彙集了各種學習理論和技巧。

previous.excerpt: With http://djaty.com/, anyone can professionally report. And no more bugs reproduction! Report includes: Screenshots Steps Clicks Logs Browser aspect Network state Background exceptions Machine aspect The line code caused the bug Integrations: Slack Jira Gitlab
previous.title: Djaty - Auto bug reporting tool while development and production

localize.description: 有了http://djaty.com/，任何人都可以专业举报。而且不再有虫子繁殖! 报告内容包括 截图 步骤 点击 日志 浏览器方面 网络状态 后台异常 机器方面 引起bug的线路代码 集成。Slack Jira Gitlab
localize.tagline: 开发和生产过程中的自动错误报告工具

localize.description: 有了http://djaty.com/，任何人都可以專業舉報。而且不再有蟲子繁殖! 報告內容包括 截圖 步驟 點擊 日誌 瀏覽器方面 網絡狀態 後臺異常 機器方面 引起bug的線路代碼 集成。Slack Jira Gitlab
localize.tagline: 開發和生產過程中的自動錯誤報告工具

next.excerpt: A single place to store your customer feedback, manage it and act upon it! Try out our new feedback widget to catch customer feedback right inside your app!
next.title: ProdCamp Feedback Widget - Nail your customer feedback

localize.description: 一个单一的地方来存储您的客户反馈，管理它并根据它采取行动! 试试我们新的反馈小工具，在您的应用程序中收集客户反馈意见!
一個單一的地方來存儲您的客戶反饋，管理它並根據它採取行動! 試試我們新的反饋小工具，在您的應用程序中收集客戶反饋意見!
